title: Print, "Tombeau monumental avec trois femmes adossées from the series "Tombeaux"", 1768, published 1770
medium:
Etching on cream laid paper
Support: cream laid paper
inscribed: Etched in lower left corner: J.L. Le Geay inv et sculp
description: A monumental vase upon a pedestal is visible through vegetation and architectural ruins. The vase is decorated with a variety of ornamental motifs, such as swags and Greek key, and is supported by four figures. In the foreground immediately before the vase are two female figures.

exhibitions.title: Excavating Design: 18th-century Drawings and Prints from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Tombeau monumental avec trois femmes adossées from the series "Tombeaux"", 1768, published 1770.
1768, published 1770. Etching on cream laid paper
Support: cream laid paper. Gift of Whitney Warren. 1958-136-1-k.
